TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Transform extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示可用在 XML 数字签名中的所有 元素从中派生的抽象基类。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which all elements that can be used in an XML digital signature derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 执行 XML 签名和验证时, ``元素描述签名者如何转换已签名的数据对象。When performing XML signing and verification, the `` element describes how the signer transformed the data object that was signed. 然后, 文档的验证程序使用``该元素以相同的方式转换已签名的数据。The verifier of a document then uses the `` element to transform the signed data in the same manner. 如果验证程序无法以相同的方式转换已签名的数据, 则无法对文档进行验证。If the verifier cannot transform the signed data in the same manner, the document cannot be verified. 如果需要将一个或多个转换对象添加到已加密的 xml 文档或已签名的 xml 文档, 请使用从类派生的类。Use a class that derives from the class whenever you need to add one or more transform objects to an encrypted XML document or to a signed XML document. 有关``元素的详细信息, 请参阅 W3C 网站上提供的[XMLDSIG 规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/)或[XML 加密规范](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)。For more information about the `` element, see the [XMLDSIG specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/) or the [XML encryption specification](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/), which are available on the W3C website.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Algorithm { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Algorithm : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于标识当前转换所执行的算法的统一资源标识符 (URI)。

span.span: Gets or sets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies the algorithm performed by the current transform.

value.span: 标识由当前 对象执行的算法的 URL。

span.span: The URI that identifies the algorithm performed by the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性与 XMLDSIG 签名中某个``元素的属性相对应。This property corresponds to the attribute of a `` element in an XMLDSIG signature. 例如, 在[XMLDSIG 规范 (Section 6.6.2)](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core1/#sec-Base-64)中定义了 Base64 解码转换的算法 URI。For example, the algorithm URI for the Base64 decoding transform is defined in the [XMLDSIG specification (Section 6.6.2)](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core1/#sec-Base-64). 您可以使用与类关联的静态字段之一轻松设置此值。You can conveniently set this value using one of the static fields associated with the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlElement ^ Context { System::Xml::XmlElement ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::XmlElement ^ value); };
member this.Context : System.Xml.XmlElement with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 对象，该对象表示当前 对象运行的文档上下文。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that represents the document context under which the current object is running.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示当前 对象运行的文档上下文。

span.span: An object that represents the document context under which the current object is running.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 签名文档时, 属性表示传递给构造函数的值。When signing a document, the property represents the value passed to the constructor. 在验证文档时, 属性表示对象。When verifying a document, the property represents object. 此属性在签名计算和检查期间自动设置, 但在调用转换之前。The property is set automatically during signature computation and checking, but before transforms are invoked.

span.span: The object used to create a digest.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the digest associated with a object.

returns.span: 与 对象关联的摘要。

span.span: The digest associated with a object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xml.XmlNodeList GetInnerXml() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function GetInnerXml () As XmlNodeList

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，返回 对象的参数的 XML 表示形式，适合以 XMLDSIG 元素的子元素的形式包含这些参数。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns an XML representation of the parameters of the object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG element.

returns.span: XML 节点的列表，这些节点表示描述 XMLDSIG 元素中当前 对象所需的特定于转换的内容。

span.span: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current object in an XMLDSIG element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 如果对象表示使用 xpath 表达式`self::text()`的 xpath 转换, 则对的调用会生成一个表示以下 XML 元素的对象: If a object represents an XPath transform using the XPath expression `self::text()`,a call to results in an object that represents the following XML element: ``` self::text() ``` 此元素对应于 XMLDSIG 规范的 Section 4.3.3.4 部分中``定义的特定于转换的内容。This element corresponds to the transform-specific content of the `` element as defined in Section 4.3.3.4 of the XMLDSIG specification. 对于上述 XPath 转换, 整个``元素如下所示:For the above XPath transform, the entire `` element is as follows: ``` self::text() ```

summary.span: 返回当前 对象的输出。

span.span: Returns the output of the current object.

The output of the current object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetOutput(class System.Type type) cil managed

param.name: type

span.span: The type of the output to return.

param.span: 此类型必须是 属性中的类型之一。

span.span: This must be one of the types in the property.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，返回指定类型的当前 对象的输出。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the output of the current object of the specified type.

returns.span: 当前 对象作为指定类型对象的输出。

span.span: The output of the current object as an object of the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法在对以前通过调用方法设置的值运行当前转换后, 返回当前转换的输出。 The method returns the output of the current transform after it is run on the value previously set by a call to the method. 返回的对象的类型必须是属性中的类型对象之一。The type of the returned object must be one of the type objects in the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.XmlElement GetXml() cil managed

summary.span: 返回当前 对象的 XML 表示形式。

span.span: Returns the XML representation of the current object.

returns.span: 当前 对象的 XML 表示形式。

span.span: The XML representation of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的`` 对象符合XMLDSIG规范的4.3.3.4部分中定义的元素的XML方案。The object returned by this method conforms to the XML Scheme for the `` element defined in Section 4.3.3.4 of the XMLDSIG specification.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property InputTypes As Type()
public: abstract property cli::array <Type ^> ^ InputTypes { cli::array <Type ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取一个类型数组，这些类型是当前 对象的 方法的有效输入。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the method of the current object.

value.span: 当前 对象的一个有效输入类型数组；只能将属于这些类型之一的对象传递给当前 对象的 方法。

span.span: An array of valid input types for the current object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the method of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的数组必须至少包含一个元素, 因为每个对象都必须接受至少一种类型作为有效输入。The array returned by the property must contain at least one element because every object must accept at least one type as valid input. 对象通常接受以下一个或多个类型作为输入: 、 或。 A object typically accepts one or more of the following types as input: , , or .

span.span: An object that specifies transform-specific content for the current object.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，将指定的 对象分析为 元素的特定于转换的内容，并配置当前 对象的内部状态以匹配 元素。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, parses the specified object as transform-specific content of a element and configures the internal state of the current object to match the element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于处理元素的子``元素。This method is used to process subelements of a `` element.

Public MustOverride Sub LoadInput (obj As Object)

span.span: The input to load into the current object.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, loads the specified input into the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入对象的类型必须是属性中的类型之一。The type of the input object must be one of the types in the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property OutputTypes As Type()
public: abstract property cli::array <Type ^> ^ OutputTypes { cli::array <Type ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取一个类型数组，这些类型是当前 对象的 方法的可能输出。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the methods of the current object.

value.span: 当前 对象的一个有效输出类型数组；从当前 对象的 方法只返回属于这些类型之一的对象。

span.span: An array of valid output types for the current object; only objects of one of these types are returned from the methods of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的数组必须包含至少一个元素, 因为每个转换必须生成至少一个类型作为输出。The array returned by the property must contain at least one element because every transform must generate at least one type as output.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropagatedNamespaces As Hashtable
public: property System::Collections::Hashtable ^ PropagatedNamespaces { System::Collections::Hashtable ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 对象，该对象包含传播到签名中的命名空间。

span.span: Gets or sets a object that contains the namespaces that are propagated into the signature.

value.span: 一个 对象，包含传播到签名中的命名空间。

span.span: A object that contains the namespaces that are propagated into the signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 命名空间用于区分文档中具有相同名称的不同元素。XML namespaces are used to distinguish different elements in a document that have the same name. 属性的键是命名空间前缀, 值为命名空间统一资源标识符 (uri)。 The keys of the property are the namespace prefixes and the values are the namespace Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs). 此属性在签名计算和检查期间自动设置, 但在调用转换之前。The property is set automatically during signature computation and checking, but before transforms are invoked.

span.span: The property was set to .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ Resolver { void set(System::Xml::XmlResolver ^ value); };

span.span: Sets the current object.
The current object.

value.span: 此属性默认为 对象。

span.span: This property defaults to an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类解析由统一资源标识符 (URI) 命名的外部 XML 资源。The class resolves external XML resources named by a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). 如果你不信任 XML 文件的源, 你可能不希望允许 XML 文件访问由 URI 命名的计算机资源。If you do not trust the source of the XML file, you might not want to allow the XML file to access computer resources named by the URI. 属性允许您通过指定不同的对象控制 XML 文件对计算机资源的访问级别。 The property allows you to control the level of access that XML files have to computer resources by specifying different objects. 如果你不希望允许任何访问权限, 则可以将此属性设置为`null` (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。If you do not want to allow any access, you can set this property to `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
